WorkItem.Description: Stumbled upon this strange bugs, or miscalculation, the EnchantCache xml file is fine and right, is the program who get them wrong somewhere.
WorkItem.Summary: [Retribution] Bug in calculation of Chest enchant

Comments.Message: Missed to tell is Rawr v2.2.1

I can not reproduce the issue you describe. I open up the provided character file with 2.2.1, it ranks +6 and +8 to stats the same as your screenshot, but lists as +10 to stats as ~26 dps. Try deleting you current copy of Rawr, and downloading a new one. If that doesn't fix it please post here again.

Yes the good things is i can not reproduce it too, its a strange things i got it after a optimization and i checked only the enchant to see if they are the right one and discovered this strange behavior popping out, if i save close the program and reopen the file its getting fixed right, atm im a little confused how to try to reproduce it another time.
